DOC.brief_summary: Primary Purpose : - To compare efficacy treat dry eye syndrome contact lens wearer computer user Tears Again® versus Opticol® versus Optive® Secondary Purpose : - Subjective evaluation symptomatology - Evaluation preference different kind administration - spray versus monodoses versus multi-doses
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Comparative Study Between Tears Again® , Opticol® Optive®
DOC.criteria: Informed Consent sign Age > 18 year < 55 year Daily wearer soft contact lens and/or daily ( > 4 hours/day ) computer user Dry eye Syndrome evaporative etiology , accord DEWS Ocular systemic disease affect normal tear film Pregnancy pregnancy risk ( contraceptive method ) , lactation
